titles.title: A bill to prohibit an escalation in United States military forces in Iraq without prior authorization by Congress.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S601)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
1/16/2007--Introduced.
Prohibits U.S. military force levels in Iraq to exceed force levels in Iraq as of January 16, 2007, without specific statutory authority enacted by Congress after the date of the enactment of this Act.
